Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Levofloxacin (0.12 to 16 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Levofloxacin antimicrobial susceptibility testing using microdilution and instrument read capability
Indications for Use Summary: Determines antimicrobial susceptibility to Levofloxacin for aerobic streptococci including Streptococcus pneumoniae, with instrument and visual read options
